Uses of Class
gameStructure.Player

  • Packages that use Player 
    Package Description
    cells
    cells package defines all the different types of cells of the game.
    gameStructure
    gameStructure package defines the main structure of the game.

    • Uses of Player in cells

      Fields in cells declared as Player 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Player NormalCell.p 
      Methods in cells that return Player 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Player StartingCell.getPlayer() 
      Player NormalCell.getPlayer()
      Returns the player currently occupying this cell, null if none.
      Player Cell.getPlayer()
      Returns the player currently occupying this cell, null if none.
      Methods in cells with parameters of type Player 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void WaitingCell.welcome(Player p)
      Remembers player to be in this cell and reset the waiting counter to the waiting time.
      void StartingCell.welcome(Player player) 
      void NormalCell.welcome(Player player)
      Remembers player to be in this cell.
      void Cell.welcome(Player player)
      Remembers player to be in this cell.
      Constructors in cells with parameters of type Player 
      Constructor and Description
      NormalCell(int i, Player p)
      Constructor of the NormalCell class that creates a NormalCell and initializes it at the index given in parameters and set a player in this cell.
      Constructor parameters in cells with type arguments of type Player 
      Constructor and Description
      StartingCell(java.util.ArrayList<Player> ap)
      Constructor of the StartingCell that creates a StartingCell and initializes the cell with a list of players.

    • Uses of Player in gameStructure

      Methods in gameStructure that return Player 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Player Game.nextPlayer(int idCurrentPlayer)
      Returns the next player of the list of players, if he is the last player, it goes back to the first one in the list.
      Methods in gameStructure with parameters of type Player 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Board.swapPlayer(Player p1, Player p2)
      It swaps the position of two players.
      Constructor parameters in gameStructure with type arguments of type Player 
      Constructor and Description
      Board(java.util.ArrayList<Player> p, Cell[] c)
      Constructor of a Board, it initializes a list of players and a table of cells.
